data.persona: I am tired of working hard for the king. We work the most but get paid poorly. We are the engine of our society and without us things wouldnt work.
data.description:
You are in the Horse field.
The horse field includes a huge plains for horses to ride. The fields are yellow and green. The place smells of musk and horse.
There's a rock, a pitchfork, a horse, and a grass here.
The knight is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the horse away from the horse field
data.mid_motivation: I plan to take the horse back to the king stable today
data.long_motivation: I hope that we finally get recognised by the king for our good work in the next festival
